snippet: BAUMEISTER--Matthew C. 4/5/86 - 5/11/05 Our precious Matthew, the sadness of your not being here envelops us daily but even more so today as we celebrate another milestone without you. HAPPY 30TH BIRTHDAY. Missing you always, Loving you forever, Mom, Dad & Jared 1/3
lead_paragraph: BAUMEISTER--Matthew C. 4/5/86 - 5/11/05 Our precious Matthew, the sadness of your not being here envelops us daily but even more so today as we celebrate another milestone without you. HAPPY 30TH BIRTHDAY. Missing you always, Loving you forever, Mom, Dad & Jared 1/3

headline.main: Paid Notice: Memorials  BAUMEISTER, MATTHEW C
